ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR( LEN( Name ) <> 7, NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", LEFT( Name , 1))), NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", MID( Name , 2, 1))), NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", MID( Name , 3, 1))), NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", MID( Name , 4, 1))), NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", MID( Name , 5, 1))), NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", MID( Name , 6, 1))), NOT(CONTAINS("0123456789", MID( Name , 7, 1))) ), $User.Id <>'00550000000yfEe', $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" )
